desc: Co-creator of open source project: Eloqua Speech Listening App
Responsible for most of the codebase
Integration with thirty-party APIs and cloud tools like Firebase
Developed and submitted analytical reports for corporate project bids
Worked in a small team to convert supplier needs questionnaires into online forms using polling apps like LimeSurvey
Conferred with engineering colleagues in development planning of e-commerce platforms for clients
Drafted English contracts and administered monthly billing checks of launched games
Responsible for translation and quality assurance of English documentation
